headline: Bolt Threads partners with Adidas for Mylo mushroom leather apparel.
summary: Bolt Threads partners with Adidas to integrate Mylo, a mushroom-based leather alternative, into apparel and footwear lines.

headline: Solar Foods expands Solein production capacity.
summary: Solar Foods increases production of Solein, a protein produced from air, CO2, and electricity, aiming to disrupt food supply chains.

headline: Formo secures funding for animal-free cheese production.
summary: Formo receives investment to scale up its precision-fermentation based cheese alternatives, targeting wider market availability.

headline: Remilk obtains regulatory approval for animal-free dairy in Asia.
summary: Remilk receives regulatory clearance to sell its animal-free dairy products in key Asian markets, expanding its global footprint.

headline: Modern Synthesis raises capital for microbial textile production.
summary: Modern Synthesis scales its microbial textile alternative to traditional leather, offering sustainable material options for fashion industry.

headline: The EVERY Co. launches animal-free egg white protein in new markets.
summary: EVERY Co. expands the availability of its precision-fermented egg white protein, targeting bakeries and food manufacturers.

headline: Piñatex partners with automotive manufacturer for vegan leather interiors.
summary: Ananas Anam's Piñatex, a pineapple-leaf based leather alternative, is adopted by an automotive manufacturer for vehicle interiors.
